txt.en: 'When I stayed in Esteldín, I made friends with a group of Earth-kin that lived not far from the refuge. They were holding out valiantly against the oppression of Angmar. Seeing what we have gone through here, I think of them and wonder if they are well.\n\n'I would like you to go and find out. If they are, I am sure there is work to be done there. Their camp is north of Esteldín, just beyond the Ram Dúath.'
'Angmar pushes against us hard. There is much help we could use.'
'Go now and speak with the Earth-kin of Lehmä-koti.'
Lehmä-koti is a small Earth-kin camp just over the border of Angmar.
Talk to the Earth-kin at Lehmä-koti
Lehmä-koti lies far to the east of Tinnudir, beyond Ram Dúath.\n\nThe Rangers have sent you to Lehmä-koti to speak with the Earth-kin.
